"The Seasonal Event":
"\"this Seasonal Event\" are special events that only last for a limited time.

During these events, the map and the appearance of some enemies will change.

In addition, the ARKS Researcher of Strange Phenomena, Xiandy, will appear near the Central Tower."

"During this Seasonal Event, an unusual hologram called a \"Mischief Symbol\" will appear somewhere in Central City.

To learn more about this Seasonal Event, talk to Xiandy and select \"Learn About Seasonal Events\"."
"Also, during this Seasonal Event, there will be additional Event-related <yellow>Daily/Weekly Tasks<c>."
